TextView.android:text:
- 'Hold and Speak' means: press, wait for orange button, talk, then let go.

 - Don't hold the phone so that the mic is covered

 - In the text area, you can touch a word and edit it

 - first pass results are computed realtime by the program as you speak 

 - final pass results are generated after taking entire context into consideration

 - Click on the back button on your phone to go back to the actual application.

 - You can get the source code from
 https://www.sourceforge.net/projects/cmusphinx/ 

 - For further assistance contact 
 air@cs.cmu.edu, dhuggins@cs.cmu.edu or aasish@cs.cmu.edu
